comments.text:
I also don't see the slow scrolling, for the most part, on Nightly. I should say that intermittently, the scrolling will be somewhat laggy, but it corrects itself after ~1 second. Could be that it was still loading something.

Platform: Ubuntu Linux 11.04, x86_64
